title: Alpha bugs
body: Alpha client is nice and clean, very easy to look at and sort through. Unfortunately, there is an insane amount of lag within the client, my summoner icon shows up when it wants to, the special game modes like doom bots, urf, etc. do no appear in game list. A lot of things are "unclickable" no matter how many times i spam left click. But other than those small bugs, it's pretty awesome.

replies.body: Can you be specific about what things are not clickable?
